entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM AST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 11:00 AM AST Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: ENE 58 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.summary: Snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 19 March 2023
